text: The Bass Rock, also known as "the Bass", is a distinctive island off the coast of East Lothian, Scotland. Scottish emigrants named three islands in the United States after the Bass Rock: Bass Rock may also refer to: *Bass Rock (Ipswich, Essex County, Massachusetts) *Bass Rock (Lynn, Essex County, Massachusetts) *Bass Rock (Norfolk County, Massachusetts) *Bass Rock (Greenland) is a small island in East Greenland, named for its resemblance to Bass Rock, Scotland ==See also== *Bass Rock (album), an album by Clyde Carson
title: Bass Rock (disambiguation)
